Activity: Log in to the system, check emails. Research available sound effects libraries or resources. Look for sounds appropriate for health-related events (taking damage, healing, death).
Implement sound effects for taking damage. Play a sound effect when the player's health is reduced. Adjust the volume and pitch of the sound to make it impactful.
Implement sound effects for healing. Play a sound effect when the player's health is increased. Choose a sound that is distinct from the damage sound. Adjust volume and pitch.
Implement a sound effect for death. Play a sound effect when the player's health reaches zero. Select a sound that is appropriate for the death event. Adjust volume and pitch.
Research available sound effects for stamina-related events (sprinting, running out of stamina). Select sounds that match the game's aesthetic.
Implement sound effects for stamina usage. Play a sound effect when the player sprints. Adjust the sound effect to match the intensity of the sprint.
Implement a sound effect for running out of stamina. Play a sound effect when the player's stamina is depleted. Use a sound that is distinct from the sprinting sound.

Thoroughly test the sound effects. Balance sound levels to avoid overwhelming the player. Ensure sounds sync correctly with actions. Document sound integration. Push the changes to the remote repository.
